CRUD Application

By the end of this guide, you will have a basic understanding of Dinoloop which covers at an introductory level. This guide assumes you have already read Getting started

Step 1. Create package.json

$ npm init

Will ask you a few questions about your project/package and then generate a package.json file for you.

Step 2. Install Dev-Dependencies

$ npm install typescript@2.4.x @types/node@10.x --save-dev
  • typescript - To transpile .ts to .js
  • @types/node - To support node types for typescript hinting and compilation

Step 3. Install Dependencies

$ npm install dinoloop express@4.x --save

Step 4. Your package.json should look similar to this 

{{package | json}}

Notice the build and start script, add it to your package.json.

  • build- Transpiles .ts to .js files into /dist directory. You can deploy these files onto node.js server
  • start- Node runs your transpiled app.js file

Step 5. Create tsconfig.json 

{{tsconfig | json}}
